Kali::
Kali smiled, she knew that Prophetus  could kill her if he liked... but he didn't know that she had a lot little tricks if she needed them.
Kali did her best smiled and said kindly "I guess, lord Prophetus, that you know that my brother Shivah wants do an alliance with Tripedocus..."
  warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: Prophetus had a grin on his face. The towering giant could easily 
crush his opponent, yet she seemed to defy him openly. She was 
brave... foolish, but very brave...

Prophetus: I assume our presence was not unannounced. I am Prophetus, 
and I lead the Tripredacus until Daemos arrives.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Kali:::
> Kali landed and looked to the tripedocus' force, she smiled and said 
"The Tripedocus, I guess... "
>   x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote: -- Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox growls, obviously wanting to get into a scrap 
> today. "Arrr, alright... I won't attack unless you give the order." 
> He arms himself. <Just make one false moves ya slagheap...> He 
> thinks to himself as he absent mindedly plays with a spear, twirling 
> around his finger.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Prophetus saw the female dragon come out of the volcano.
> > 
> > Prophetus: Jetstorm, Anachronox, stay alert. It seems our 
> neighbour is 
> > not alone...
> > 
> > Jetstorm: Just let 'em make just one wrong move!
> > 
> > Prophetus: No! None of that unless they attack... or I give the 
> order. 
> > Got that, Anachronox?
> > 
> 
> 
>
